Conclusion: ^You have concluded your journey through Dragoman: The English in the Ottoman World...
^Across the five stories you have made your way through to reach the end  of this educational experience.
^For more context on these documents on which these stories were inspired from...
^Check out the Lewis Walpole Library blog which includes historical context by the History Research team on each chapter.
